712799f-a.text:
216-226 East 42nd Street, south side, between Second and Third Aves. The Daily News Building, East 42nd (left) and 4ist (right) Streets, between Third (foreground) and Second Aves., as seen eastward from the Chanin Building. Also shown is a portion of Tudor City silhouetted against the East River and Long Island City. On the extreme left is
the Bartholomew Building.
About 1931.
Ewing Galloway.  inea aS GEV
